title: Purchase History
body: Why can't I see my full purchase history

replies.body: Your purchase history on the client only shows the past 90 days of purchases, and I believe the past 30 days of RP purchases. Essentially, we limit it to this since those are the time periods that you can do refunds for those items. It would feel a little weird if the purchase was listed, but you weren't able to actually use a refund token on it.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lgL38NTE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-04T01:44:59.774+0000)
>
> Your purchase history on the client only shows the past 90 days of purchases, and I believe the past 30 days of RP purchases. Essentially, we limit it to this since those are the time periods that you can do refunds for those items. It would feel a little weird if the purchase was listed, but you weren't able to actually use a refund token on it.

I want to see all my purchase history because I want to know how often I purchase RP.
I guess I'd just like to see what I waste all my ip and rp on
